title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\PolicyTag
name: PolicyTag
description:
Denotes one policy tag in a taxonomy, for example, SSN.

Policy tags can be defined in a hierarchy. For example:

+ Geolocation
  + LatLong
  + City
  + ZipCode

Where the "Geolocation" policy tag contains three children.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.PolicyTag

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. Resource name of this policy tag in the URL format. The policy tag manager generates unique taxonomy IDs and policy tag IDs.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Required. User-defined name of this policy tag. The name can't start or end with spaces and must be unique within the parent taxonomy, contain only Unicode letters, numbers, underscores, dashes and spaces, and be at most 200 bytes long when encoded in UTF-8.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Description of this policy tag. If not set, defaults to empty. The description must contain only Unicode characters, tabs, newlines, carriage returns and page breaks, and be at most 2000 bytes long when encoded in UTF-8.

params.name: data.parent_policy_tag
params.description: Resource name of this policy tag's parent policy tag. If empty, this is a top level tag. If not set, defaults to an empty string. For example, for the "LatLong" policy tag in the example above, this field contains the resource name of the "Geolocation" policy tag, and, for "Geolocation", this field is empty.

params.name: data.child_policy_tags
params.description: Output only. Resource names of child policy tags of this policy tag.
